spells.name: Barkskin
spells.description: Grants +2 (or higher) enhancement to natural armor.

spells.name: Bear's Endurance
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Con for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Cat's Grace
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Owl's Wisdom
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Protection from Energy
spells.description: Absorbs 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.

spells.name: Speak with Plants
spells.description: You can talk to plants and plant creatures.

spells.name: Spike Growth
spells.description: Creatures in area take 1d4 damage, may be slowed.

spells.name: Summon Nature's Ally II
spells.description: Summons creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.description: Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.
